attributes.action: Michael Gove and David Willetts must compensate the taxpayer for any time they have spent lobbying for a yacht for the Royal Family
attributes.additional_details: Michael Gove and David Willetts are public representatives, not private lobbyists. Any and all time that they have spent working on the proposal for a new royal yacht represents a clear waste of public money. This petition calls for the value of that time to be calculated as a proportion of their salaries, and for that money to be refunded to the taxpayer.
